content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
--------------------
No new composite structures have been successfully placed on the map. Multiple attempts to supply a Lab for research at position (0.5, 2.5) failed—both its placement (due to a lack of lab inventory) and its crafting (due to insufficient sub-ingredients). In parallel, existing smelting facilities were utilized without any new construction:
• Iron Smelting Facility – Retrieved at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for converting iron ore into iron plates.
• Copper Smelting Facility – Retrieved at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for converting copper ore into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
----------
• API Argument Errors for get_entities  
 – When calling get_entities, use the correct signature. Remove unsupported keyword arguments (such as “radius”) and avoid supplying unexpected positional arguments.

• Lab Placement Validation  
 – Before attempting to place a Lab, verify that the required Lab item exists in inventory to avoid placement failures.

• Safe Handling of Entity Retrieval  
 – When filtering retrieved entities (for example, labs), ensure that a None return value is converted to an empty iterable to prevent type errors.

• Resource and Recipe Management in Lab Crafting  
 – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron plates, iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, and electronic circuits) are available before attempting Lab crafting. Prioritize completing necessary smelting processes and resource production so that recipe requirements can be fully met.

NAMESPACE
---------
(No custom functions were defined by the agent.)
